verses.verse: And as He was going <S%G1607><s%> out of the temple, <S%G2413><s%> one <S%G1520><s%> of His disciples <S%G3101><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to Him, "Teacher, <S%G1320><s%> behold <S%G2396><s%> what <S%G4217><s%> wonderful <S%G4217><s%> stones <S%G3037><s%> and what <S%G4217><s%> wonderful <S%G4217><s%> buildings! <S%G3619><s%>"

And Jesus <S%G2424><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to him, "Do you see <S%G991><s%> these <S%G3778><s%> great <S%G3173><s%> buildings <S%G3619><s%>? Not one stone <S%G3037><s%> shall be left <S%G863><s%> upon another <S%G3037><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> will not be torn <S%G2647><s%> down. <S%G2647><s%>"

And as He was sitting <S%G2521><s%> on the Mount <S%G3735><s%> of Olives <S%G1636><s%> opposite <S%G2713><s%> the temple, <S%G2413><s%> Peter <S%G4074><s%> and James <S%G2385><s%> and John <S%G2491><s%> and Andrew <S%G406><s%> were questioning <S%G1905><s%> Him privately, <S%G2596><s%> <S%G2398><s%>

"Tell <S%G3004><s%> us, when <S%G4219><s%> will these <S%G3778><s%> things <S%G3778><s%> be, and what <S%G5101><s%> [will be] the sign <S%G4592><s%> when <S%G3752><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> these <S%G3778><s%> things <S%G3778><s%> are going <S%G3195><s%> to be fulfilled <S%G4931><s%>?"
And Jesus <S%G2424><s%> began <S%G757><s%> to say <S%G3004><s%> to them, "See <S%G991><s%> to it that no <S%G3361><s%> one <S%G5100><s%> misleads <S%G4105><s%> you.
"Many <S%G4183><s%> will come <S%G2064><s%> in My name, <S%G3686><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> 'I am <S%G1510><s%> [He!'] and will mislead <S%G4105><s%> many. <S%G4183><s%>

"And when <S%G3752><s%> you hear <S%G191><s%> of wars <S%G4171><s%> and rumors <S%G189><s%> of wars, <S%G4171><s%> do not be frightened; <S%G2360><s%> [those things] must <S%G1163><s%> take <S%G1096><s%> place; <S%G1096><s%> but [that is] not yet <S%G3768><s%> the end. <S%G5056><s%>

"For nation <S%G1484><s%> will arise <S%G1453><s%> against <S%G1909><s%> nation, <S%G1484><s%> and kingdom <S%G932><s%> against <S%G1909><s%> kingdom; <S%G932><s%> there will be earthquakes <S%G4578><s%> in various <S%G2596><s%> places; <S%G5117><s%> there will [also] be famines. <S%G3042><s%> These <S%G3778><s%> things <S%G3778><s%> are [merely] the beginning <S%G746><s%> of birth <S%G5604><s%> pangs. <S%G5604><s%>

"But be on your guard; <S%G991><s%> for they will deliver <S%G3860><s%> you to [the] courts, <S%G4892><s%> and you will be flogged <S%G1194><s%> in [the] synagogues, <S%G4864><s%> and you will stand <S%G2476><s%> before <S%G1909><s%> governors <S%G2232><s%> and kings <S%G935><s%> for My sake, <S%G1752><s%> as a testimony <S%G3142><s%> to them.
"And the gospel <S%G2098><s%> must <S%G1163><s%> first <S%G4413><s%> be preached <S%G2784><s%> to all <S%G3956><s%> the nations. <S%G1484><s%>

"And when <S%G3752><s%> they arrest <S%G71><s%> you and deliver <S%G3860><s%> you up, do not be anxious <S%G4305><s%> beforehand <S%G4305><s%> about what <S%G5101><s%> you are to say, <S%G2980><s%> but say <S%G2980><s%> whatever <S%G3739><s%> <S%G1437><s%> is given <S%G1325><s%> you in that hour; <S%G5610><s%> for it is not you who speak, <S%G2980><s%> but [it is] the Holy <S%G40><s%> Spirit. <S%G4151><s%>

"And brother <S%G80><s%> will deliver <S%G3860><s%> brother <S%G80><s%> to death, <S%G2288><s%> and a father <S%G3962><s%> [his] child; <S%G5043><s%> and children <S%G5043><s%> will rise <S%G1881><s%> up against <S%G1909><s%> parents <S%G1118><s%> and have them put <S%G2289><s%> to death. <S%G2289><s%>

"And you will be hated <S%G3404><s%> by all <S%G3956><s%> on account <S%G1223><s%> of My name, <S%G3686><s%> but the one who endures <S%G5278><s%> to the end, <S%G5056><s%> he shall be saved. <S%G4982><s%>

"But when <S%G3752><s%> you see <S%G3708><s%> the abomination <S%G946><s%> of desolation <S%G2050><s%> standing <S%G2476><s%> where <S%G3699><s%> it should <S%G1163><s%> not be (let the reader <S%G314><s%> understand <S%G3539><s%>), then <S%G5119><s%> let those <S%G3588><s%> who <S%G3588><s%> are in Judea <S%G2453><s%> flee <S%G5343><s%> to the mountains. <S%G3735><s%>

"And let him who <S%G3588><s%> is on the housetop <S%G1430><s%> not go <S%G2597><s%> down, <S%G2597><s%> or <S%G3366><s%> enter <S%G1525><s%> in, to get <S%G142><s%> anything <S%G5100><s%> out of his house; <S%G3614><s%>
and let him who <S%G3588><s%> is in the field <S%G68><s%> not turn <S%G1994><s%> back <S%G3694><s%> <S%G1994><s%> to get <S%G142><s%> his cloak. <S%G2440><s%>

"But woe <S%G3759><s%> to those <S%G3588><s%> who are with child <S%G1722><s%> <S%G1064><s%> and to those <S%G3588><s%> who nurse <S%G2337><s%> babes <S%G2337><s%> in those <S%G1565><s%> days! <S%G2250><s%>
"But pray <S%G4336><s%> that it may not happen <S%G1096><s%> in the winter. <S%G5494><s%>

"For those <S%G1565><s%> days <S%G2250><s%> will be a [time of] tribulation <S%G2347><s%> such <S%G3634><s%> as has not occurred <S%G1096><s%> since <S%G575><s%> the beginning <S%G746><s%> of the creation <S%G2937><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> created, <S%G2936><s%> until <S%G2193><s%> now, <S%G3568><s%> and never <S%G3756><s%> <S%G3361><s%> shall.

"And unless <S%G1487><s%> <S%G3361><s%> the Lord <S%G2962><s%> had shortened <S%G2856><s%> [those] days, <S%G2250><s%> no <S%G3756><s%> <S%G3956><s%> life <S%G4561><s%> would have been saved; <S%G4982><s%> but for the sake <S%G1223><s%> of the elect <S%G1588><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%> He chose, <S%G1586><s%> He shortened <S%G2856><s%> the days. <S%G2250><s%>

"And then <S%G5119><s%> if <S%G1437><s%> anyone <S%G5100><s%> says <S%G3004><s%> to you, 'Behold, <S%G2396><s%> here <S%G5602><s%> is the Christ <S%G5547><s%>'; or, 'Behold, <S%G2396><s%> [He is] there <S%G1563><s%>'; do not believe <S%G4100><s%> [him;]

for false <S%G5580><s%> Christs <S%G5580><s%> and false <S%G5578><s%> prophets <S%G5578><s%> will arise, <S%G1453><s%> and will show <S%G4160><s%> signs <S%G4592><s%> and wonders, <S%G5059><s%> in order, <S%G4314><s%> if <S%G1487><s%> possible, <S%G1415><s%> to lead <S%G635><s%> the elect <S%G1588><s%> astray. <S%G635><s%>
"But take <S%G991><s%> heed; <S%G991><s%> behold, <S%G2400><s%> I have told <S%G4275><s%> you everything <S%G3956><s%> in advance. <S%G4275><s%>

"But in those <S%G1565><s%> days, <S%G2250><s%> after <S%G3326><s%> that tribulation, <S%G2347><s%> the sun <S%G2246><s%> will be darkened, <S%G4654><s%> and the moon <S%G4582><s%> will not give <S%G1325><s%> its light, <S%G5338><s%>
and the stars <S%G792><s%> will be falling <S%G4098><s%> from heaven, <S%G3772><s%> and the powers <S%G1411><s%> that are in the heavens <S%G3772><s%> will be shaken. <S%G4531><s%>

"And then <S%G5119><s%> they will see <S%G3708><s%> the Son <S%G5207><s%> of Man <S%G444><s%> coming <S%G2064><s%> in clouds <S%G3507><s%> with great <S%G4183><s%> power <S%G1411><s%> and glory. <S%G1391><s%>

"And then <S%G5119><s%> He will send <S%G649><s%> forth <S%G649><s%> the angels, <S%G32><s%> and will gather <S%G1996><s%> together <S%G1996><s%> His elect <S%G1588><s%> from the four <S%G5064><s%> winds, <S%G417><s%> from the farthest <S%G206><s%> end <S%G206><s%> of the earth, <S%G1093><s%> to the farthest <S%G206><s%> end <S%G206><s%> of heaven. <S%G3772><s%>

"Now <S%G1161><s%> learn <S%G3129><s%> the parable <S%G3850><s%> from the fig <S%G4808><s%> tree: <S%G4808><s%> when <S%G3752><s%> its branch <S%G2798><s%> has already <S%G2235><s%> become <S%G1096><s%> tender, <S%G527><s%> and puts <S%G1631><s%> forth <S%G1631><s%> its leaves, <S%G5444><s%> you know <S%G1097><s%> that summer <S%G2330><s%> is near. <S%G1451><s%>

"Even so, <S%G3779><s%> you too, <S%G2532><s%> when <S%G3752><s%> you see <S%G3708><s%> these <S%G3778><s%> things <S%G3778><s%> happening, <S%G1096><s%> recognize <S%G1097><s%> that He is near, <S%G1451><s%> [right] at the door. <S%G2374><s%>

"Truly <S%G281><s%> I say <S%G3004><s%> to you, this <S%G3778><s%> generation <S%G1074><s%> will not pass <S%G3928><s%> away <S%G3928><s%> until <S%G3360><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> these <S%G3778><s%> things <S%G3778><s%> take <S%G1096><s%> place. <S%G1096><s%>
"Heaven <S%G3772><s%> and earth <S%G1093><s%> will pass <S%G3928><s%> away, <S%G3928><s%> but My words <S%G3056><s%> will not pass <S%G3928><s%> away. <S%G3928><s%>

"But of that day <S%G2250><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> hour <S%G5610><s%> no <S%G3762><s%> one <S%G3762><s%> knows, <S%G3609><s%> not even <S%G3761><s%> the angels <S%G32><s%> in heaven, <S%G3772><s%> nor <S%G3761><s%> the Son, <S%G5207><s%> but the Father <S%G3962><s%> [alone.]
"Take <S%G991><s%> heed, <S%G991><s%> keep <S%G69><s%> on the alert; <S%G69><s%> for you do not know <S%G3609><s%> when <S%G4219><s%> the [appointed] time <S%G2540><s%> is.

["It is] like <S%G5613><s%> a man, <S%G444><s%> away <S%G590><s%> on a journey, <S%G590><s%> [who] upon leaving <S%G863><s%> his house <S%G3614><s%> and putting <S%G1325><s%> his slaves <S%G1401><s%> in charge, <S%G1849><s%> [assigning] to each <S%G1538><s%> one <S%G1538><s%> his task, <S%G2041><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> commanded <S%G1781><s%> the doorkeeper <S%G2377><s%> to stay <S%G1127><s%> on the alert. <S%G1127><s%>

"Therefore, <S%G3767><s%> be on the alert <S%G1127><s%> – for you do not know <S%G3609><s%> when <S%G4219><s%> the master <S%G2962><s%> of the house <S%G3614><s%> is coming, <S%G2064><s%> whether <S%G2228><s%> in the evening, <S%G3796><s%> at midnight, <S%G3317><s%> at cockcrowing, <S%G219><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> in the morning <S%G4404><s%> –
lest <S%G3361><s%> he come <S%G2064><s%> suddenly <S%G1810><s%> and find <S%G2147><s%> you asleep. <S%G2518><s%>
"And what <S%G3739><s%> I say <S%G3004><s%> to you I say <S%G3004><s%> to all, <S%G3956><s%> 'Be on the alert! <S%G1127><s%>'"
